messages.message: it’s not that cypress tests take 4+ hours, they usually take around 2-3. The main reason usually is failures where for each test, it can wait up to 1 minute for an element to show up. Maybe we can try shortening this wait time by default to around 15 seconds and see how it impacts the tests. The # of failed tests also is going up so that doesn’t help with timing.
@Eric Han that makes sense.  Let's do that?  Also, is it possible to run the various suites in parallel to.increase the test runtime?
we already have 5 machines running tests in parallel. We can increase parallelization which can also speed up tests
With 5 machines the tests take 2-3 hours?  Isn't that actually quite long?  Our Golden's for example take about 40 mins to complete.
let’s try shortening the failure timeout first, I think we might see a big improvement. Some tests do take up to 4-5 minutes even if they are successful
got it, are you coordinating that @Eric Han?
